title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Renata Skeleton -20 60>>
<<moveToX Renata Skeleton -10 60>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
Mia-miascaredface: Eww!<<moveToY Mia Skeleton -30 60>>
<<moveToX Mia Skeleton -20 60>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
[[noticeDagger]]

title: noticeDagger
body:
Renata: Wow...
<<moveUp Renata 5 10>>
Renata: Hey, a dagger!
<<moveUp Renata 5 10>>
[[yuck]]

title: yuck
body:
<<moveUp Mia 5 80>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveDown Mia 5 80>>
Mia: Ew, you're touching the skeleton dagger?
[[takedagger]]

title: takedagger
body:
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveDown Renata 5 10>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.5>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
Renata: Maybe we'll need it!
Mia: Yuck.[[cleanup]]
